programmes.show_description: (2022) Erotic thriller with Kat Graham. Claire gets more than she bargained for when she begins a steamy affair with her boss's wife. But she's got her own dark past too.
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
(1961) Western starring John Wayne and Stuart Whitman. A Texas Ranger is forced to team up with his prisoner while he's on a covert mission to take on a band of thieves and gunrunners.
(1957) Offbeat melodrama starring Richard Burton (as an RAF officer), Joan Collins (as a nun), Basil Sydney and Cy Grant, who end up on a life raft together after their ship is torpedoed.
(1939) John Ford western with Henry Fonda and Claudette Colbert. In 1776, a settler and his wife attempt to farm in the Mohawk Valley but face attacks from Native Americans and the English.
(1940) Swashbuckling action-adventure starring Tyrone Power. An aristocrat dons his mask and cape to fight for the rights of the poor in 19th-century California. With Basil Rathbone.
(2019) Fourth instalment of the sci-fi comedy franchise with Chris Hemsworth, Tessa Thompson and Liam Neeson. An alien-obsessed rookie joins London's Men in Black team.
(2013) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Johnny Knoxville and Forest Whitaker. A small-town sheriff and his inexperienced staff take on a drug cartel boss who's fleeing to Mexico.
(1989) Fantasy horror with Julian Sands and Richard E Grant. Using magic, an evil warlock flees to 80s LA from the olde-worlde. Can he unmake creation before a witch-finder tracks him down?
(2019) Comedy slasher sequel with Jessica Rothe. Following the accidental creation of a time loop, our hero - Tree - has another murderer to stop. Déjà vu anyone?
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
(1958) Swashbuckling adventure starring June Laverick. Robin Hood is dead and his band of followers seek a worthy new leader. And they get one who exceeds all their expectations.
(2005) Comedy. Ben (Jimmy Fallon) must choose between his two loves: Lindsey (Drew Barrymore) and the Boston Red Sox baseball team. Based on Nick Hornby's novel Fever Pitch.
(2020) Touching adventure with Harrison Ford, based on Jack London's classic novel. A big, friendly hound finds himself unwittingly travelling across late 19th-century North America.
(1993) Comedy starring Robin Williams and Sally Field. A struggling actor dresses as a woman to get his estranged wife to hire him as a housekeeper, so he can spend more time with his kids.
(2022) Fact-based comedy starring Bryan Cranston and Annette Bening as a retired couple who find a way to exploit a lottery loophole. But then some rich kids try to muscle in...
Director Quentin Tarantino and stars Samuel L Jackson, Christoph Waltz, Jamie Foxx and Kerry Washington talk about making the western adventure set against a backdrop of slavery.
(2012) Quentin Tarantino's darkly comic, award-laden western with Jamie Foxx, Christopher Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio and Samuel L Jackson. A freed slave searches for his wife... and revenge.
